trans-unit.source: Provides data for the **Navigating** event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o **navegando** eventos.

trans-unit.source: These event arguments contain information about the navigation that was requested, and are passed to handlers of the **Navigating** event, which is implemented by the following: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> NavigatingCancelEventArgs encapsulates the following details of the navigation request: - **Navigation Initiation**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.NavigationMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsNavigationInitiator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esses argumentos de eventos contêm informações sobre o painel de navegação que foi solicitado e é passado para manipuladores do **navegando** evento, que é implementado pelos seguintes motivos:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>NavigatingCancelEventArgs encapsula os seguintes detalhes da solicitação de navegação:- **iniciação de navegação**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.NavigationMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsNavigationInitiator%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsNavigationInitiator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.NavigationMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - **Navigation Content**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - **Conteúdo de navegação**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A>

trans-unit.source: - **Navigation Request**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - **Solicitação de navegação**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: - **Navigation State**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.TargetContentState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - **Navigation State**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.TargetContentState%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.TargetContentState%2A></xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A></xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>

trans-unit.source: This information allows you to both evaluate the nature of the navigation request, and view and update specified request details before navigation occurs.
trans-unit.target: Essas informações permite que você avalie a natureza da solicitação de navegação e exibir e atualizar os detalhes da solicitação especificado antes da ocorrência de navegação.

trans-unit.source: Based on the navigation request information provided by NavigatingCancelEventArgs, or based on application-specific state or code, you can completely prevent navigation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` (by default, <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> is `false`).
trans-unit.target: Com base nas informações de solicitação de navegação fornecida pelo NavigatingCancelEventArgs ou com base no estado específico do aplicativo ou código, você pode evitar completamente navegação definindo o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade `true` (por padrão, <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>é `false`).</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the content object that is being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência ao objeto de conteúdo que está sendo navegado.

trans-unit.source: You can navigate to content using either a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] or an object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode navegar para o conteúdo usando um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] ou um objeto.

trans-unit.source: When navigating to an object, which occurs when calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, Content contains a reference to the content object that is being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Ao navegar para um objeto, que ocorre ao chamar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, conteúdo contém uma referência ao objeto de conteúdo que está sendo navegado.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A> property will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A>propriedade será `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object> reference to the content object that is being navigated to; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>referência ao objeto de conteúdo que está sendo navegado para; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object that is associated with the back navigation history entry for the page being navigated from.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define o <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> objeto que está associado com a entrada do histórico de navegação para a página que está sendo navegada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> event is raised when navigating from one piece of content to another.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>evento é gerado durante a navegação de um item de conteúdo para outra.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>

trans-unit.source: The content that is being navigated from is added to back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo que está sendo navegado é adicionado para fazer o histórico de navegação.

trans-unit.source: You can set ContentStateToSave with a custom <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object to associate state information with content in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir ContentStateToSave com um personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>objeto para associar informações de estado do conteúdo no histórico de navegação.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object that is associated with the back navigation history entry for the page being navigated from.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> objeto que está associado com a entrada do histórico de navegação para a página que está sendo navegada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the optional data <xref:System.Object> that was passed when navigation started.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os dados opcionais <xref:System.Object>que foi passado quando iniciado de navegação.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: ExtraData can be used to pass context-specific data that is specific to a particular navigation.
trans-unit.target: ExtraData pode ser usado para passar dados de contexto específico que são específicos para uma navegação em particular.

trans-unit.source: ExtraData contains a reference to the object that is passed as the second argument when calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: ExtraData contém uma referência ao objeto que é passado como o segundo argumento ao chamar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, ele será `null`.

trans-unit.source: The optional data <xref:System.Object> that was passed when navigation started.
trans-unit.target: Os dados opcionais <xref:System.Object>que foi passado quando iniciado de navegação.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the navigator (<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>) that is specified by <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator*> is servicing this navigation, or whether a parent navigator is doing so.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o navegador (<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref>) que é especificado pela <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator*>está servindo esta barra de navegação, ou se um navegador pai está fazendo portanto</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the navigator that is specified by <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator*> is servicing this navigation.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Boolean>valor que é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o navegador que é especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator*>está atendendo a essa navegação.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator*> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> is returned, such as during a nested <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref> navigation.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> for retornado, tais como durante um aninhada <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref> navegação.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode"></xref> value that indicates the type of navigation that is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode"> </xref> valor que indica o tipo de navegação que está ocorrendo.

trans-unit.source: The types of navigation that can occur are: - Navigating to new content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>).
trans-unit.target: Os tipos de navegação que pode ocorrer são: - navegando para o novo conteúdo (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>

trans-unit.source: - Navigating to the previous item in back navigation history (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>).
trans-unit.target: -Navegando para o item anterior no histórico de navegação (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>

trans-unit.source: - Navigating to the next item in forward navigation history (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>).
trans-unit.target: -Navegando até o próximo item no histórico de navegação de avanço (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>

trans-unit.source: - Refreshing existing content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>).
trans-unit.target: -Atualizando o conteúdo existente (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode"></xref> value that indicates the type of navigation that is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode"> </xref> valor que indica o tipo de navegação que está ocorrendo.

trans-unit.source: The navigator that raised this event.
trans-unit.target: O navegador que gerou esse evento.

trans-unit.source: While Navigator stores a reference to the navigator that raised this event, the navigator may not have actually initiated the navigation.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto o navegador armazena uma referência para o navegador que gerou esse evento, o navegador pode não ter realmente iniciada a navegação.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether this navigator did initiate the current navigation, inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsNavigationInitiator%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar se este navegador iniciou a navegação atual, inspecione o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsNavigationInitiator%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsNavigationInitiator%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the navigator that raised this event
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que é o navegador que disparou este evento</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object that is to be applied to the content being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> objeto a ser aplicado ao conteúdo que está sendo direcionado.

trans-unit.source: TargetContentState will contain a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object if navigating to content in back or forward navigation history that has a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: TargetContentState conterá um <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>objeto se navegar no conteúdo ou encaminhar o histórico de navegação que tem um <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>objeto associado a.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object that is to be applied to the content being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> objeto a ser aplicado ao conteúdo que está sendo direcionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the content being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] para o conteúdo que está sendo direcionado.

trans-unit.source: You can navigate to content using either an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] or an object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode navegar para o conteúdo usando um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] ou um objeto.

trans-unit.source: When navigating to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], which occurs when calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, Uri contains the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Ao navegar para um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], que ocorre ao chamar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, Uri contém o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] do conteúdo que está sendo navegado.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A> property will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A>propriedade será `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> for the content being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Uri>para o conteúdo que está sendo direcionado.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: If navigating to an object, Uri is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se navegar para um objeto, o Uri é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> object that is used to request the specified content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>objeto que é usado para solicitar o conteúdo especificado.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=fullName> is an abstract base class that encapsulates a Web request, and is protocol agnostic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=fullName>é uma classe base abstrata que encapsula uma solicitação da Web, e é independente de protocolo.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For each common protocol, the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] includes a class that derives from <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=fullName> and extends it with protocol specific state and behavior, including: - <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `pack://` scheme to request application data files (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: Para cada protocolo comum, o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] inclui uma classe que deriva de <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=fullName>e estende com estado específico do protocolo e o comportamento, incluindo:- <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] que usam o `pack://` esquema para solicitar os arquivos de dados do aplicativo (consulte [recursos de aplicativo do WPF, conteúdo e arquivos de dados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> </xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `http://` scheme to request files from Web servers.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] que usam o `http://` esquema para arquivos de solicitação de servidores Web.</xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `ftp://` scheme to request files from FTP servers.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] que usam o `ftp://` esquema para arquivos de solicitação de servidores FTP.</xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `file://` scheme to request local files.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] que usam o `file://` esquema solicitar arquivos locais.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: You can both view and modify <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> details.
trans-unit.target: Você pode exibir e modificar <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>detalhes.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: WebRequest is `null` when navigation occurs by: - Using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: WebRequest é `null` ocorre quando a navegação por: - usando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>

trans-unit.source: - Calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> - Setting <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>- Configuração <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> chamar

trans-unit.source: - Navigating through HTML content in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: -Navegando pelo conteúdo HTML em <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=fullName> object that is used to request the specified content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=fullName> objeto que é usado para solicitar o conteúdo especificado.
